overview: In this erotic thriller, Heather Leighton (former Playboy Playmate Lisa Boyle) is on the cusp of a hot modeling career in Boston when her luck takes a brutal turn. After witnessing a murder, Heather is on the run from a group of dangerous criminals. With her boyfriend Jamie (Christopher Roblee) in tow, Heather tries to escape Boston's frightening underworld with her life and career intact.
title: Pray for Power
